assignments.description: Sets the field values for FundingAwardRequirementRecord and then adds it to the FundingAwardRequirementRecords record collection.
assignments.name: AddFundingAwardRequirementToCollection
assignments.label: Add Funding Award Requirement to Collection

assignments.description: Resets the value of the NewRequirementRecordsCount variable to the number of requirements created by the flow.
assignments.name: ResetNewFundingRequirementsCount
assignments.label: Reset New Funding Requirements Count

assignments.description: Resets the variables involved in creating funding award requirements. Sets the FundingAwardRequirementRecords collection to a blank value, the NewRequirementRecordsCount variable to 0, the TimeZoneOffsetDate variable to the value in FirstRequirementDueDate in the ScreenCollectFundingAwardRequirementDetails screen, and the FirstRequirementDueDateTimeZoneOffset variable to the value of the TimeZoneOffsetFormula.
assignments.name: SetRecurringFundingAwardRequirements
assignments.label: Set Recurring Funding Award Requirements

assignments.description: Sets the TimezoneOffsetDate to the value of FundingRequirementDueDateFormula.
assignments.name: SetTimeZoneOffsetForDueDate
assignments.label: Set Time Zone Offset on Due Date

choices.description: Stores the choice label and value for the Day option for PeriodPicklist on the ScreenCollectFundingAwardRequirementDetails screen.
choices.name: ChoicePeriodDay

choices.description: Stores the choice label and value for the Month option for PeriodPicklist on the ScreenCollectFundingAwardRequirementDetails screen.
choices.name: ChoicePeriodMonth

choices.description: Stores the choice label and value for the Week option for PeriodPicklist on the ScreenCollectFundingAwardRequirementDetails screen.
choices.name: ChoicePeriodWeek

choices.description: Stores the choice label and value for the Year option for PeriodPicklist on the ScreenCollectFundingAwardRequirementDetails screen.
choices.name: ChoicePeriodYear

decisions.description: Determines whether the funding award is found by checking if the Funding Award in Get Funding Award variable contains a record.
decisions.name: HaveFundingAward
decisions.label: Have Funding Award?

decisions.description: Determines whether the flow should add another new funding award requirement record to the FundingAwardRequirementRecords collection by checking if NewRequirementRecordsCount is less than the value in the NewRequirementsCount screen component in the ScreenCollectFundingAwardRequirementDetails screen.
decisions.name: ShouldAddAnotherFundingAwardRequirement
decisions.label: Should Add Another Funding Award Requirement?

Flow.description: Shows the flow user a preview of existing funding disbursement records, creates new funding disbursement records on a recurring schedule, and optionally creates related budget allocations records.

formulas.description: Generates a name for a funding award requirement using the name from the GetFundingAwardRequirement element and the year, month, and day from the NewRequirementDueDateAdjustedForTimezone variable.
formulas.name: FundingAwardRequirementNameFormula

formulas.description: Calculates the date/time for the due date that isn't adjusted for the running user's time zone for the funding requirement created by the flow.
formulas.name: FundingRequirementDueDateFormula

formulas.description: Calculates the date/time for the due date of the funding requirement created by the flow based on the running user's time zone.
formulas.name: FundingRequirementDueDateTimeZoneAdjustmentFormula

formulas.description: Calculates the difference between TimeZoneOffsetDate and UTC for each hour of the schedule.
formulas.name: TimeZoneOffsetFormula

Flow.label: Create Recurring Funding Award Requirements

recordCreates.description: Creates funding award requirement records using the values in the FundingAwardRequirementRecords record collection.
recordCreates.name: CreateFundingAwardRequirements
recordCreates.label: Create Funding Award Requirements

recordLookups.description: Gets the funding award record with an ID that matches the recordId passed into the flow. Stores the result in the recordId record variable.
recordLookups.name: GetFundingAwardRecord
recordLookups.label: Get Funding Award

recordLookups.description: Gets the funding award requirement records that are related to the funding award by checking for funding award requirements with a funding award that matches recordId. Stores the ID, Name, FundingDisbursementId, DueDate,, Status, Type, and Description of the results in the Funding Award Requirements from Get Funding Award Requirements record collection.
recordLookups.name: GetFundingAwardRequirements
recordLookups.label: Get Funding Award Requirements

recordRollbacks.description: Cancels all pending record creation for elements after CreateFundingAwardRequirements.
recordRollbacks.name: RollBackRecordsCreateFundingAwardRequirementsError
recordRollbacks.label: Roll Back Record Creation

screens.description: Allows the flow user to review existing requirements and specify the recurring schedule to create more requirements.
screens.name: ScreenCollectFundingAwardRequirementDetails
screens.label: Collect Funding Award Requirement Details

screens.description: Displays a confirmation to the flow user when the funding award requirements are created and shows the new records in a data table. Shows the Finish button in the footer. Hides the Previous and Pause buttons in the footer to avoid unintentionally creating or updating records.
screens.name: ScreenDisplayConfirmationCreateFundingAwardRequirement
screens.label: Display Confirmation

fields.name: ConfirmationDisplayText
fields.fieldText: {!NewRequirementRecordsCount} funding award requirements were created. Review the new records in the table.

value.stringValue: Created Funding Award Requirements Data Table

screens.description: Displays an error to the flow user when there's an error creating funding award requirement records.
screens.name: ScreenDisplayErrorCreateFundingAwardRequirements
screens.label: Display Error

fields.name: ErrorCreateFundingAwardRequirementsText
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong and we couldn't create an account record. Click Previous to try again or contact your Salesforce admin for help.


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

screens.description: Displays an error to the flow user when there's an error getting the funding award or related funding award requirement.
screens.name: ScreenDisplayErrorGetRecords
screens.label: Display Error

fields.name: ErrorGetRecordsDisplayText
fields.fieldText:
Something went wrong and we couldn't get the funding award record or the related funding award requirement records.


{!$Flow.FaultMessage}

screens.description: Displays an error to the flow user when a record wasn't found in the Funding Award in Get Funding Award variable or when the flow user doesn't have permission to read the funding award record.
screens.name: ScreenDisplayErrorNoFundingAward
screens.label: Display Error

fields.name: ErrorNoFundingAwardDisplayText
fields.fieldText: We couldn't find the funding award record.

screens.description: Allows the flow user to review the new funding award requirements before the records are created. The user can update values in the PreviewFundingAwardRequirementsDataTable, click Previous to go back and adjust the schedule, or click Create Requirements.
screens.name: ScreenPreviewFundingAwardRequirements
screens.label: Preview Funding Award Requirements

fields.name: PreviewFundingAwardRequirementsDisplayText
fields.fieldText: Preview funding award requirements before creating the records. You can update values in the table. To adjust the recurrence schedule, click Previous and update the schedule. When the funding award requirements look right, click Create Requirements.

value.stringValue: Preview Funding Award Requirements Data Table

stages.description: Stores the label and order for the stage where the flow creates funding award requirements. This label appears on the progress bar when a user runs this flow.
stages.name: CreateRequirementsStage
stages.label: Create Requirements

stages.description: Stores the label and order for the stage where the user reviews user-entered values for funding award requirements that the flow will create. This label appears on the progress bar when a user runs this flow.
stages.name: PreviewRequirementsStage
stages.label: Preview Requirements

variables.description: Stores the number of time zones away from UTC to use for the first requirement due date.
variables.name: FirstRequirementDueDateTimeZoneOffsetCount

variables.description: Stores the funding award requirement record to be created.
variables.name: FundingAwardRequirement

variables.description: Stores the collection of funding award requirement records created by the flow.
variables.name: FundingAwardRequirementRecords

variables.description: Stores the number of requirement records to be created by the flow.
variables.name: NewRequirementRecordsCount

variables.description: Stores the ID of the funding award passed into the flow.
variables.name: recordId

variables.description: Stores a temporary date-only value of the record due date.
variables.name: TimeZoneOffsetDate
